message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you be able to accommodate this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is cutting it too close to my bottom line. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $12,500. This is my final offer.
